thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: WENDI
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by WENDI

author: WENDI
title: WENDI
text: Booked car, showed up to pick it up..was immediately looked after by administrator as I had my 3 month old with me. Car was is great condition and very suitable for what I needed. Same treatment on return...have used this company a lot. .would recommend :-) Let them know what airline you are traveling with - some airlines will get you an extra discount - I forgot this time and they don't offer the information :-(
